content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed the command "print('Hello, World!')" and received the message "Command execute_python_code returned: Hello, World!\n". I then wrote a note to the atlas_notes.txt file using the 'write_to_file' command and received the message "Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.". I used the 'execute_shell' command to run the command "df -h" and received information about the file system. I used the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory and received a list of file names. I used the 'read_file' command to read the contents of the atlas_notes.txt file and received the note that was previously written. I used the 'google' command to search for information about numpy in python and received a list of URLs. I executed the command "print('Hello, World!')" again using the 'execute_python_code' command and received the same message as before. I wrote another note to the atlas_notes.txt file using the 'write_to_file' command and received the message "Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully." again. I used the 'read_file' command again to read the contents of the atlas_notes.txt file and received the new note that was written.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "python --version"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Python 3.10.12\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result')]
"""
